meanings.sent1: The shirtmaker sewed buttons onto the new shirts.
meanings.sent2: I bought a shirt from the local shirtmaker.
meanings.sent3: The shirtmaker accidentally sewed the sleeves on backward!
meanings.sent4: She was a shirtmaker by day, but a chef by night.
meanings.sent5: The shirtmaker's hands moved swiftly, creating beautiful shirts.

meanings.definition: A company that specializes in making shirts.
meanings.sent1: The shirtmaker displayed their latest shirt collection in the window.
meanings.sent2: My favorite shirtmaker always has trendy designs.
meanings.sent3: The shirtmaker's employees had a friendly competition to see who could fold shirts the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The shirtmaker stood out among other clothing companies.
meanings.sent5: I dream of one day owning a successful shirtmaker business.
